comments.text:
Some users report that they cannot easely switch from Outlook (for MAC) to Thunderbird, because Thunderbird doesn't list Outlook as a mail client avalaible for MAC.

Recent User request:
http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=39&t=2214521
http://www.geckozone.org/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=98198
comments.author: el.cameleon.1@gmail.com
